title: COVID-19 relief options
cleaned_text: COVID-19 relief options Notice: We are unable to accept new applications for COVID-19 relief loans or grants. We continue to offer PPP loan forgiveness. - Paycheck Protection ProgramThis forgivable loan helps keep your workforce employed. - COVID-19 EIDLThis low-interest loan provides help to businesses experiencing revenue loss. - Shuttered Venues GrantThis grant supports eligible venues affected by COVID-19. - Restaurant Revitalization FundFunding for eligible restaurants, bars, and other food service businesses. - SBA debt reliefWe will make loan payments for some existing SBA borrowers. - Report ID theftLearn how to report suspected ID theft to SBA. Need help? Get free business counseling - Make a payment to SBACreate an account to pay your COVID-19 EIDL loan, or check your account balance and due date. - Preventing ID theft and fraudLearn how businesses can work together with SBA to prevent and report suspected fraud. - Content in other languagesUse translations of SBA forms and other materials to help prepare your applications. Help slow the spread of COVID-19 - Employers that promote vaccination against COVID-19 may be eligible to receive a [tax credit](https://www.irs.gov/newsroom/employer-tax-credits-for-employee-paid-leave-due-to-covid-19) [Find a vaccine provider](https://www.vaccines.gov/)(Vaccines.gov) [Quick start guide - preparing your workforce for vaccine requirements](https://www.sba.gov/brand/assets/sba/resource-partners/covid19-quickstart-guide-workplace-508.pdf) [Small business guide - strengthening workplace vaccination & safety](https://www.sba.gov/brand/assets/sba/resource-partners/covid19-smallbiz-guide-vaccines-508.pdf) [COVID-19 vaccines - a conversation guide for managers](https://www.sba.gov/brand/assets/sba/resource-partners/covid19-vaccine-conversation-guide-managers-508.pdf) More SBA resources Learn about [SBA's plan for use
